mail_body:
Dear John,

Thank you for choosing our relocation services! We're thrilled to assist you with your move to Austin. We've made excellent progress on securing your new furnished apartment.

Your apartment viewing is scheduled for Monday, November 4th, at 2:00 PM. Agent Sarah will be there to meet you and answer any questions you may have. The address will be sent to you separately in a confirmation email.

We're committed to making your transition as smooth as possible. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or concerns.

Sincerely,
The Relocation Team
mail_summary: Confirmation email for apartment viewing in Austin.
